semantic_identifier: [GOLD-106]: Define outcome events + schema for closed-loop learning telemetry
title: Define outcome events + schema for closed-loop learning telemetry

sections.text: Create a canonical set of outcome events (e.g., recommendation shown, accepted/applied, sequence executed, reply/meeting booked, stage change, close won/lost) and a versioned schema to log them with required context (segment, rep, motion, account/opportunity, CRM IDs, timestamp). Ensure events can be joined back to the specific recommendation instance to enable attribution. Document the schema and add lightweight validation to prevent missing/invalid fields.
